casebody.data:
No. 11-6615. Gregory Byers, on Behalf of Nicole Byers, Petitioner v. Marlboro County School District. 565 U.S. 1018, 132 S. Ct. 560,

181 L. Ed. 2d 404,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8018. November 7, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 443 Fed. Appx. 859.
